sourcesContent:
<template>
  </template>
    <script>
    import SideBarDetail from '../../components/SideBarDetail.vue';
    import axios from 'axios';
    export default {
    components: { SideBarDetail },
    name:'adminDetail',
    data(){
            return{
                details:[],
                dialogAdd: false,
                dialogEdit: false,
                currentItem: '',
                dialogDelete: false,
                DetailtId:'',
          }
      },
      methods:{
          getDetail(){
              axios.get('https://652a313955b137ddc83f5b36.mockapi.io/Apiendpoint/Nino')// ('Link api tren swagger')
              .then(response =>{
                  this.posts = response.data;
              })
              .catch(error=>{
                  console.log(error);
              })
          },
          deleteDetail(){
              axios.delete('https://652a313955b137ddc83f5b36.mockapi.io/Apiendpoint/Nino/' +'/'+ this.DetailId)
              .then(response =>{
                  var newArr = this.details.filter(x => x.DetailId !=this.DetailId);
                  this.posts = newArr;
                  this.dialogDelete = false;
                  console.log(response.status)
              })
              .catch(error=>{
                  console.log(error);
              }) 
              
          }
      },
      created(){
          this.getDetail();
      },
      
  };
    </script>
    
 
  </style>
